ComicInfo.Summary:
Happy Haunting Grounds: The boys inadvertently frighten Papa.
Rudy Learns a Mighty Good Lesson: Dinky teaches a scoffing Rudy a much deserved lesson... with a little help.
Pulling Stumps: Farmer Gray's efforts to uproot a tree stump by the strength of his horse are thwarted when the chain used for pulling the stump snaps. Enter Dimwit with a substitute for the chain.
Off to the City: The boys make sure their harried Papa catches his train. ...Poor Papa.
Choo Choo: While on a train trip, Dimwit follows the instructions of every railroad employee he encounters - but still gets thrown off the train.
The Serenade: Sourpuss hopes to woo a senorita.
The Raiders From Saturn: An epic adventure in four chapters pitting Mighty Mouse and his archenemy The Claw against an invading force of monstrous bat-winged green cats from the planet Saturn. The Claw comes to Mighty Mouse in good faith, seeking aid against the terrifying alien-cats - a move that displeases The Claw's scientific ally Professor Ohm. Ohm double-crosses mice and cats alike, forging a secret alliance with the Saturnians.
What a Look: Heckle and Jeckle pull a prank on Dimwit, that breaks Chesty's valuable mirror. They pay dearly.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jeckle,Chesty,Gandy Goose,Dimwit,Dinky Duck,Mighty Mouse,Heckle,Mitzi Mouse,Sourpuss,Rudy the Rooster,Professor Ohm,Terry Bears,Farmer Al Falfa
